adudecalledleo.lionutils.config

Class ConfigHolder<T extends Config>

  • java.lang.Object
    • adudecalledleo.lionutils.config.ConfigHolder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - POJO config type

    public class ConfigHolder<T extends Config>
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds, loads and saves a POJO configuration.
    Since:
    4.0.0

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ConfigHolder.Builder<T extends Config>
      Builds a ConfigHolder instance.
      static class  ConfigHolder.Event
      Represents a configuration event.

        public static <T extends Config> ConfigHolder.Builder<T> builder(java.nio.file.Path configPath,
                                                                 java.lang.Class<T> configType,
                                                                 java.util.function.Supplier<T> defaultFactory)
        Constructs a ConfigHolder.Builder.
        Parameters:
        configPath - path to config file, relative to the main config directory
        configType - type of config POJO
        defaultFactory - factory to create default POJO.
        this should always return a new instance.
        Returns:
        the builder instance
        Since:
        4.1.0

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(java.util.function.BiConsumer<ConfigHolder.Event,T> listener)
        Removes a listener. It will no longer be called when the config is loaded or saved.
